text.p: True or false: Every linear transformation from a vector space [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] to a vector space [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] has a standard matrix.

font.p: False. Only linear transformations from [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] to [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline] (or, more generally, from [mathjaxinline]F^ n[/mathjaxinline] to [mathjaxinline]F^ m[/mathjaxinline] where [mathjaxinline]F[/mathjaxinline] is a field) have standard matrices.
